cause.description:
Too often, people who are normal weight have no idea of the discrimination there is in this world against those who are obese. Many times, they say to just lose weight, but why don't they climb Mt. Everest- basically the same thing.
1. People must recognize that the world is filled with discrimination against obese people.
cause.mission: spread the knowledge of what it is like to be obese.
cause.name: Obesity Awareness
